metadata.title: CVE-2017-7189 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: main/streams/xp_socket.c in PHP 7.x before 2017-03-07 misparses fsockopencalls, such as by interpreting fsockopen('127.0.0.1:80', 443) as if theaddress/port were 127.0.0.1:80:443, which is later truncated to127.0.0.1:80. This behavior has a security risk if the explicitly providedport number (i.e., 443 in this example) is hardcoded into an application asa security policy, but the hostname argument (i.e., 127.0.0.1:80 in thisexample) is obtained from untrusted input.

criterions.comment: php7.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
